backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing daily leaderboards, allowing score submissions with sorting and retrieval of top 100 entries per date.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing branding updates, impacted files, components, and test IDs for recent UI branding changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend source paths to short descriptions of component, page, and game logic responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS config defining theme variables for light/dark modes and applying base background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point setting page metadata and mounting the app with title 'Adwait Loop'.
frontend/src/achievements/definitions.ts: Defines the list of achievement IDs, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/achievements/engine.ts: Achievement evaluation logic that unlocks achievements based on performance data and stored unlock state.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring the router, theme provider, sync manager, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Global layout with header, navigation bar, branded logo/wordmark, routed content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/Heatmap365.tsx: Renders a 365‑day activity heatmap with tooltips and status colors based on local game history.
frontend/src/game/dailyPuzzle.ts: Generates the daily puzzle by combining date seed, puzzle type, and difficulty to produce deterministic puzzle instances.
frontend/src/game/difficulty.ts: Manages difficulty state with persistence, computing current difficulty and updating it based on performance data.
frontend/src/game/hints.ts: Tracks daily hint usage by date key and limits use to three per day.
frontend/src/game/puzzles/numberMatrix.t: Generates a 4x4 number matrix puzzle, validates user input, and provides cell-based hints.
frontend/src/game/puzzles/patternMatch.t: Creates simple symbol or color pattern puzzles with multiple-choice answers and validation plus direct-answer hints.
frontend/src/game/puzzles/registry.ts: Defines available puzzle types and selects one deterministically using a date-derived seed.
frontend/src/game/puzzles/sequenceSolver: Generates numeric sequence puzzles with missing values, validates answers, and offers positional hints.
frontend/src/game/puzzles/types.ts: Defines shared interfaces for puzzle instances, validation results, and hint structures.
frontend/src/game/renderers/NumberMatrix: Renders the number matrix grid UI, handling editable and fixed cells and propagating input updates.
frontend/src/game/renderers/PatternMatch: Displays pattern sequences and option buttons, tracking user selection and emitting changes.
frontend/src/game/renderers/PuzzleRender: Central puzzle UI that renders the correct view, validates input, manages hints, scoring, and reset actions.
frontend/src/game/renderers/SequenceSolv: Renders the sequence solver inputs, allowing edits only in blank positions and updating state changes.
frontend/src/game/scoring.ts: Calculates puzzle scores with penalties for hints and optional time-based bonuses.
frontend/src/game/sharing.ts: Encodes and decodes shareable puzzle payloads using base64 JSON.
frontend/src/game/streaks.ts: Computes daily play streaks based on completion dates and tracks streak-breaking conditions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks to manage Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalGameState.ts: Manages local game state such as daily progress, streaks, settings, achievements, and submissions using local storage and game logic helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks the browser’s online/offline status using window events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps a leaderboard fetch in a React Query hook using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/leaderboard/queries.ts: Fetches leaderboard data with offline caching and fallback to IndexedDB when offline or errors occur.
frontend/src/lib/dateSeed.ts: Generates date keys, converts them to numeric seeds, and returns lists of recent dates.
frontend/src/lib/prng.ts: Implements a seeded pseudo‑random number generator with helpers for floats, ints, and shuffling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AchievementsPage.tsx: Displays the full achievements list, showing which ones the user has unlocked.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows today’s puzzle status, streak info, and a 365‑day activity heatmap.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Displays the daily leaderboard, handles online/offline states, and prompts login for score submission.
frontend/src/pages/PuzzlePage.tsx: Loads the daily or shared puzzle, tracks progress and completion, and provides sharing and navigation UI.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Displays account, gameplay, and difficulty settings with toggles and Internet Identity login/logout actions.
frontend/src/storage/db.ts: Provides wrappers around localStorage and IndexedDB for async and sync key-value storage.
frontend/src/storage/models.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for daily records, settings, and queued score submissions.
frontend/src/storage/repo.ts: Implements high-level storage operations for daily records, settings, achievements, and submission queue.
frontend/src/sync/scoreQueue.ts: Retries queued score submissions by sending them to the backend and clearing the queue if successful.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing architecture, features, requirements, and assets.
